en.title: **Owner** and Lead Developer
en.text: As the owner and lead developer of Code Monkey Studios, I lead a team of skilled professionals in the development of websites, mobile applications and internal software solutions for businesses. At Code Monkey Studios, we specialize in creating custom digital experiences to help grow our clients' businesses. My role includes managing all aspects of development from initial design and coding to deployment and post-launch support while ensuring that projects are delivered on time and meet the highest standards of quality. I also handle client communication, project management, and strategic decision-making, ensuring a smooth process from start to finish.

es.title: **Propietario** y Desarrollador Principal
es.text: Como propietario y desarrollador principal de Code Monkey Studios, lidero un equipo de profesionales especializados en el desarrollo de sitios web, aplicaciones móviles y soluciones de software internas para empresas. Nos especializamos en crear experiencias digitales personalizadas para ayudar al crecimiento de los negocios de nuestros clientes.

en.title: Freelance **Software Engineer**
en.text: As a Freelance Software Engineer with Re:Edge Marketing (REM), I contributed to building innovative, data-driven and technology-powered marketing solutions that drive exceptional growth for clients. Working closely with REM's team of strategists, designers and writers, I develop scalable and cutting-edge web applications and solutions aligned with the company's customer-centric approach and commitment to excellence.

es.title: **Ingeniero de Software** Freelance
es.text: Como Ingeniero de Software Freelance en Re:Edge Marketing (REM), contribuyo al desarrollo de soluciones de marketing innovadoras y basadas en datos que impulsan un crecimiento excepcional para los clientes.

en.title: **Software** Engineer
en.text: As a Software Engineer at TD, I play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining innovative software solutions that enhance business processes and customer experiences. My responsibilities include building scalable applications, ensuring high code quality through rigorous testing, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement cutting-edge technologies. By leveraging agile methodologies, I focus on delivering robust and efficient solutions aligned with TD's commitment to innovation and customer-centricity.

es.title: **Ingeniero** de Software
es.text: Como Ingeniero de Software en TD, desempeño un papel crucial en el diseño, desarrollo y mantenimiento de soluciones de software innovadoras que mejoran los procesos comerciales y las experiencias de los clientes.

en.title: Teaching **Assistant**
en.text: As a Teaching Assistant at Coding Dojo, I supported aspiring developers in mastering programming languages, frameworks and software development best practices. My role included assisting students with debugging code, reviewing and providing project feedback while fostering a collaborative and inclusive learning environment. I conducted one-on-one sessions, led group discussions and provided clear and helpful feedback to help students overcome challenges and solve their logic and additional problems. I contributed to curriculum development while demonstrating coding concepts, reinforcing problem-solving strategies and ensuring students gained the confidence and skills needed to succeed in the tech industry.

es.title: **Asistente** de Enseñanza
es.text: Como Asistente de Enseñanza en Coding Dojo, apoyé a desarrolladores aspirantes en el dominio de lenguajes de programación, frameworks y mejores prácticas de desarrollo de software.
